title: Ep 125: Halloween Power Hour 3
description:
The Judgies are having a Live Friendsgiving on November 20th. Go to moment.co/thejudgies for tickets!!!
In this Episode:  OUR THIRD ANNUAL HALLOWEEN POWER HOUR! Friend of the pod Jake joins us again as we read a listener's scary story, a r/NoSleep post about a husband and his new podcast, and Josh reads some highly rated Two Sentence Horror Stories.
Get Judgies Merch Here: https://store.streamelements.com/judgiespod
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!  https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)   P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350
Leave a Review!   https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod
Intro Music by: Iván  https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

In this Episode:  OUR THIRD ANNUAL HALLOWEEN POWER HOUR! Friend of the pod Jake joins us again as we read a listener's scary story, a r/NoSleep post about a husband and his new podcast, and Josh reads some highly rated Two Sentence Horror Stories.
